effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 692,515 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 292,521.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Equip: While above 80% health, direct healing you do also redistributes up to 2% of your health to your target.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 79 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 10% and your Stamina by 15% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.
